title: Implement tk attachments list command
description:
Add 'tk attachments' command to list attachments for a tick.

## Command

```bash
tk attachments <tick-id> [flags]

Flags:
  --json    Output as JSON
  --urls    Output only URLs (one per line, for scripting)
```

## Output (default)

```
Attachments for abc (2):
  a1b2  Login page redesign       login.png     245KB  2024-01-15 10:30
  c3d4  Error state               error.png      89KB  2024-01-15 10:35
```

## Output (--urls)

```
https://attachments.tickboard.dev/x7k2.../login.png
https://attachments.tickboard.dev/y8m3.../error.png
```

## Output (--json)

```json
{
  "tick_id": "abc",
  "attachments": [
    {"id": "a1b2", "filename": "login.png", "url": "...", ...}
  ]
}
```
